Detailed Description

Provides various input and output methods.

Function Documentation

DLL_API void DLL_CALLCONV FreeImageAlgorithms_CopyBytesToFBitmap ( FIBITMAP *  src,
BYTE *  data,
int  padded 
)

Copy an array of bytes to FIBITMAP.

Parameters:
src FreeImage Bitmap to copy bytes to.
data bytes to copy.
padded Is the data padded to 32 bit boundaries.

int  width,

int  vertical_flip

Load a rgb FIBITMAP from an array of bytes.

Parameters:
data bytes to copy.
bpp of resulting image.
width of resulting image.
height of resulting image.
padded Is the data padded to 32 bit boundaries.
vertical_flip int Should the image be vertically flipped.
Returns:
FIBITMAP* on success and NULL on error.

DLL_API FIBITMAP* DLL_CALLCONV FreeImageAlgorithms_LoadFIBFromFile ( const char *  filepath  ) 

Load a FIBITMAP from a file. The file is loaded using a plugin determined from the filename extension.

Parameters:
filepath OS Path to the file to be loaded.
Returns:
FIBITMAP* on success NULL on error.

Parameters:
data bytes to copy.
bpp of resulting image.
width of resulting image.
height of resulting image.
data_type FREE_IMAGE_TYPE of resulting image.
padded Is the data padded to 32 bit boundaries.
vertical_flip int Should the image be vertically flipped.
Returns:
FIBITMAP* on success and NULL on error.

DLL_API int DLL_CALLCONV FreeImageAlgorithms_SaveFIBToFile ( FIBITMAP *  dib,
const char *  filepath,
FREEIMAGE_ALGORITHMS_SAVE_BITDEPTH  bit_depth 
)

Save a FIBITMAP to a file. The file to be saved using a plugin determined from the filename extension.

Parameters:
dib FreeImage Bitmap to be saved.
filepath OS Path to the file to be saved.
bit_depth The bit depth which is either BIT8 or BIT24
Returns:
int FREEIMAGE_ALGORITHMS_SUCCESS on success or FREEIMAGE_ALGORITHMS_ERROR on error.
